page.title: 06 The G.P.O. Sorting Office.
page.content: One hundred and twenty people work at the G.P.O. Sorting Office in Blythe Street. The deliveries cover a radius of about eight miles. There are seventy bicycles and twenty-six vans for the two deliveries each day. Sometimes the gates have to be shut when money is loaded on to the vans. The sorting office deals with up to {twenty-five thousand letters} every day. Christmas is their busiest time when they need lots of extra help. Second class postage is more popular at present than first class. On all their vans are the following words: {Please Use the Post Code}.
